children: # This ensures the `Loader` will take from the `RingBuffer`s result
# channel, and that a new results channel is created on repeated
# iteration. (Since `Loader`) closes the previous at the end of
# Internally, `RingBuffer` will `put!` the result in the results channel
Unlike DataLoaders.jl, this currently does not use task pools since
has shown to be more performant. This may change in the future. See PR 33 https://github.com/JuliaML/MLUtils.jl/pull/33
handles the asynchronous iteration and fills a result channel.
ensures that the same buffers are reused and the loading works asynchronously.
